website_summaries.verdict: San Pellegrino has been synonymous with quality for over 100 years; you can't beat this price for big, 33-ounce bottles.
pros: San Pellegrino has more subtle bubbles, if you're averse to strong carbonation
A bottle goes great with a meal
Of course, San Pellegrino is equally enjoyable by itself
cons: The subtle fizziness falls flat for some

customer_reviews.title: Flat
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 10 cases of this water— it’s all vaguely flat. For comparison, we bought another bottle at the store— it was not flat. Must have been poorly stored or something. Pretty tough to return water...
customer_reviews.author: Colby the Aussie

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mineral water.  Tastes great and is good for you
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gawd, this is my very favorite of all the mineral waters. So much better than Perrier. I read somewhere in a newspaper health article that Pellegrino undergoes huge pressure for centuries, moving very slowly from one cavern to another. I may describe it poorly, but it is really good for you (I take it to help my bones among other things) and it tastes great. I haven't spent a great deal of time trying to understand the issues, but there's pretty strong research that it's better for your health to eat alkaline foods - or rather foods that are alkalizing. The calcium and magnesium make this an alkaline food.
customer_reviews.author: Rani Lueder

customer_reviews.title: Great water, good price.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. Compared to supermarket prices, if you have Prime, this is an excellent price for this water, better than and cheaper than Perrier. Only drawback is that San Pellegrino is now owned by Nestle... but the water comes from Italy, not California.
customer_reviews.author: B. Marold

customer_reviews.title: 2 were flat
customer_reviews.text: I love san pellegrino, but 2 of the bottles in the pack had almost no carbonation. I understand one bottle being messed up, but 2 bottles in a package makes me wonder about storage and handling conditions in the warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E

customer_reviews.title: I prefer Pelligrino the most, I just realized after this purchase of a whole box
customer_reviews.text: I drink all kinds of carbonated beverages. Didn't realize I actually LOVE Pellegreno. The carbonation is different than traditonal factory soda pop type. It's a tad less strong carbonation, but it is just right and does not disapte the moment you unseal the large bottle.
customer_reviews.author: JonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: THE GOLDILOCKS OF SPARKLING WATER!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE This Stuff... Has The Purrfect Amount & Strength of Bubbles! And the large bottle stays bubbly through the 3 servings I drink over a day or 2! NO MORE Zypherhills (or Arrowhead or whoever, depending on where you live)! And if you Catch The Price at $13.98 (which I Always Do!), The Cost Cannot Be Beat! OH, And, Delivery To My Front Door For Prime FREE... It's The Ultimate! I Wish Prime included vacuuming At MY House!
customer_reviews.author: FairyKat

customer_reviews.title: Pleased and will reorder when needed.
customer_reviews.text: Quick 2 day prime delivery. Could use some cushioning inside the large shipping box for less movement of actual product box inside the large box it came in to prevent what I’ve read a few reviewers say regarding damaged box or broken bottles. I have added 5 photos. The product date is good 02-2020 and nothing is damage or missing in my delivery, so I’m happy! The price with taxes that I paid is $1.40 a bottle. Thank you amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Naynay

customer_reviews.title: Water comes in Plastic Bottles and is totally Flat
customer_reviews.text: We usually buy this water from the local store. It comes in glass bottles and it is excellent, taste and gas. The Amazon water arrived OK, but when I opened the bottle, about 2 or 3 bubbles raised to the surface and that was it. Since I do not know what caused the gas to dissipate from the bottle, I do not want to drink it. I do not recommend buying mineral water in plastic bottles anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Lady C

customer_reviews.title: I feel bad for my mailman
customer_reviews.text: Again, I feel bad for my mailman. I'm really sorry, bro. I bet you hate me when you smile at me through the door. Everything was perfect with the contents, but the box arrived broken and disheveled. That's what I get for making my mailman deliver a box of water to my doorstep instead of carting it up the stairs my damn self.
customer_reviews.author: Pacificos

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Odor
customer_reviews.text: I have always ordered the 33.8 fl oz bottles of Pellegrino and love them but decided to try the smaller ones but that turned out to be a huge mistake. I received the product and when I opened the box, there was a very strong odor of rubber. I assumed that it was the packaging and that it would go away but it didn't. I decided to pour it into a glass instead but realized that the odor was in the water as well. I hope nobody else goes through the same thing because it leaves a smell on your hands from even touching the bottles and drinking it made me feel disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: CZ

customer_reviews.title: Almost no sparkle
customer_reviews.text: As others have written, I too have received almost "flat" water. I know plastic bottles will not hold on to the carbonation as long as glass bottles will - whether it's a soft drink or water. Maybe those of us whose water doesn't sparkle very much got bottles that had been sitting in storage too long. I won't be buying these again - the price is not a bargain if the water is almost flat when received. I'll go back to the glass bottles from the grocery store - when I buy glass, I can open it, drink a small amount if that's all I want, seal the bottle back up, and it's still sparkling for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: El Light

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT I REPEAT DO NOT BUY!!!!!! -0 stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are FLAT!!!!! I'm sorry irritated I didn't read the reviews!!! I'm only on here now to see if I was crazy or what! I literally had to check to see if they were sealed??????? They taste like tap water!!!!! What a joke!!!!!!! I literally drink this brand and Perrier for a living! Never have I ever tasted this. It's non returnable so I hope I can just prevent someone else experiencing this. I don't know what they are selling but s. Pellegrino IS NOT IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: A real thirst-quencher.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this sparkling water. It is a crisp, unsweetened mineral water which quenches my thirst here in hot Texas. So nice to get away from sugar and artificial sweeteners. Plastic bottles are BIG.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Non-Fluoride drinking water for cellular function
customer_reviews.text: This water is what healthy people should be drinking. Supplements can be dissolved in this water thanks to carbonation which makes minerals available to cells. Water analysis is available from the manufacturer online, and isn't polluted with fluoride like most bottled waters. We do wish it was still available in glass bottles, but the plastic is BPA free. Anyone working in a water treatment plant knows how toxic "purified" water can be, and manufactures don't have to supply information on where their water is bottled. No toilet paper fragments, discarded medications, chemicals or toxic heavy metals in this water. Very pleased with this product, and glad Italy has good free flowing water to share. That won't be the case forever.
customer_reviews.author: kix66

customer_reviews.title: Excellence In Water...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this water, and I'm subscribed, too. However, of concern to me that on this lashipp that was the bottle that I've uploaded a picture of. First time ever, I've a bottle 1/2 filled, at best, still sealed and not leaking. Odd. Just wanted someone to know...
customer_reviews.author: Cyndee...

customer_reviews.title: The best of the “Big 3” sparkling waters
customer_reviews.text: In my mind San Pelligrino is the “just right” option out of what I consider the “Big 3” of sparkling water; San Pelligrino, Topo Chico, and Perrier. Perrier isn’t effervescent enough and Topo Chico seems to be almost like minor assault to me. San Pelligrino on the other hand is just the right effervescence for me. They come in a variety of flavors but artificially acquired fruit flavors always seems to be just a little bit disconcerting to me. I prefer the plain one and would recommend to anyone who is underwhelmed by Perrier or overwhelmed by Topo Chico.
customer_reviews.author: Bigalo Dickmas

customer_reviews.title: Product lacks "fizz" factor
customer_reviews.text: Product. arrived in good condition with intact packaging. Nothing seemed awry until I popped open my first bottle. It didn't fizz when the seal on the cap was broken. Product is flat. I wish I could return it to Amazon, but I already threw away the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: WillyWonka

customer_reviews.title: What a deal.....
customer_reviews.text: The best sparkling water Europe has to offer , delivered to my verandah free of charge and 3 Dollars cheaper than Sam's club. I am old and not as sturdy as I used to be so I love being pampered by Amazon and Total Wine and More, they bring my single malt scotch and other beverages to make me forget how old I am to my verandah. Life is good.
customer_reviews.author: Karin B.

customer_reviews.title: So Yummy and Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I'm from Germany and was raised on sparkling mineral water. I'm so glad I can get the San Pellegrino mineral water at Amazon because I would miss sparkling mineral water dearly. I drink it as is or mix it with juice or with powdered drink mixes. It is wonderful, healthy, and refreshing!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela I. Bright

customer_reviews.title: very refreshing, healthy, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: we've been buying this mineral water for a while now and we love it! i am from germany and we trink a lot of mineral water there so i can tell pretty well when a mineral water is of great quality. this one really is! it is also always delivered very quickly and packaged very well. we will stick with this one for sure. great taste, great quality!
customer_reviews.author: morningsun

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price & quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. I have been a subscribe & save customer for this product for almost a year. It saves me almost $6 a case (x2) compared to Sam's club pricing. I havent experienced the "flat" water that I have seen in some of the reviews. It is the same quality every time (and the same as I can buy at the grocery store).
customer_reviews.author: ༒Ƙarma༒

customer_reviews.title: Addictive
customer_reviews.text: I am addicted to these now. Don't know why. I am trying new things because of the you know what, I tried hard seltzer and loved it but wanted to be able to drink it all day. So I bought this on a whim, didn't expect them to be so huge but also didn't expect to go through one in like 5 minutes some days. It has health benefits too, some calcium and it fills you up so you eat less. I've lost 12 pounds due to this and a combination of other things such as buffets being closed, exercising more etc.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfmaster

customer_reviews.title: Sparkling Water From Italy (5- Stars)
customer_reviews.text: Although I normally like sparkling water with a little more fizz to it, I love how fresh and clean San Pellegrino tastes. My husband and I go through a lot of sparkling water as our preferred drink since it provides great mouth feel without calories or sweeteners. Previously, we drank seltzer water, but when our usual brand became hard to find, we switched to this. We haven't looked back. The bottles are a green plastic, not glass, for better or worse. -- Debbie Lee Wesselmann
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Lee WesselmannTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Delivered to the door
customer_reviews.text: Updated my review and changed my star , so I have been buying peligrino from Amazon since last year ! And I have always paid less Around $14.99 now it’s over $25.00 plus ! There is zero reason for this And you should adjust the prices ! I only drink Pellegrino . Was super excited to see that you can write cases of water delivered to your door !!! I felt the taste was off different from the store bought . So far one was flat . Updated : I’ve ordered several Times and thank you for delivering today !
customer_reviews.author: New york

customer_reviews.title: People don't seem to actually enjoy mineral water; better than Perrier
customer_reviews.text: After living in Europe for 3 years where mineral water is more available than sunlight, this is the closest product I've been able to find within a somewhat decent price point. Perrier gets a higher rating because people don't even enjoy the mineral taste. This won't be as bubbly as Perrier either, but if you're looking to actually Drink your water in relatively short order like me, this isn't a problem. Not to mention, this has WAY more minerals than Perrier, which does a body good.
customer_reviews.author: J D

customer_reviews.title: YUCK!!!
customer_reviews.text: PLASTIC BOTTLES?!? Ugggh! For a natural product? The plastic bottle completely detracts from the “experience” of drinking Pellegrino. Many people are opting for LESS plastic, not more. This very disappointing. Plus, the flavor is just “meh” and flat in plastic container. Canceling subscription now.
customer_reviews.author: MeOwl

customer_reviews.title: Great product BUT poor packaging! Caution when handling ....
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a negative review but a caution! Despite complaints to Amazon, product continues to arrive in a single box when ordered by 2 units. It is extremely heavy and bulky to anyone handling and a risk to bodily harm. I personally now am discontinuing future shipments.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: All were flat.....
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 cases as a deal-of-the-day - great price! But the reviews were so-so, predominately related to lack of carbonation. I have finished 14 bottles and indeed the first case and the bottles from the second case are flat - barely any bubbles ! Something is wrong!!! If you are a fan of Pellegrino, would purchase elsewhere until they figure out what is wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Jim L.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Mineral Water
customer_reviews.text: I tried different mineral waters. This one is the best. Il has peasant flavor, CO2 and lots of minerals. It helps me a lot to stay hydrated during my 12-hour work shift. Besides, the price is very reasonable. Unfortunately, most people prefer drinking soda in this country. This mineral water is much healthier choice.
customer_reviews.author: vincent

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I had to stop the auto shipment on this because we have too much in reserve. So much that I started bringing a case to very small gatherings just to give away. Having the bottles on hand for impromptu visits, dinner parties, and social gatherings met the need, but now with social distancing, we have a serious backlog. If the need ever arises again, that this is a household must-have, I'll gladly purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Brea

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great mineral water
customer_reviews.text: San Pellegrino has been my favorite mineral water for 40+ years. I rarely buy it because it's expensive. So I was thrilled to find this at such a good price. I originally bought the 12-oz bottles, but I didn't like having that much plastic. I know, this bottle is plastic, too, but slightly less than two small bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ondrejka

customer_reviews.title: Best sparkling around / Great value
customer_reviews.text: If you wait long enough you can catch these on super sale and rock them for around 60 cents a throw. With that in mind this is the best sparkling water for the money period. Throw in som TrueLime and TrueLemon for zero carb zero sugar sprite and you’re rocking the diet. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt W.

customer_reviews.title: A Very Refreshing Water & I Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this S.Pellegrino Sparkling Natural Mineral Water, 16.9 fl oz. (12 Pack) regularly. I drink 1 or 2 bottles every day instead of sodas. I love the bubbles and the taste is refreshing too! The 16.9 oz is a perfect size for me. A 12 oz drink is too small but 24 oz is too much, so these are a perfect size! Price is a bit high, but it does seem to fluctuate on Sub and Save.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Belle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sparkling Water
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sparkling water. The carbonation is not too strong like some others, it is just perfect. It has a smooth clean taste to it and I will continue to order it. I highly recommend the sparkling water.
customer_reviews.author: James Agee

customer_reviews.title: I love this water!
customer_reviews.text: I get this every month because I love this water so much. It has a mineral taste to it that some people don't like, so if you haven't tried San Pellegrino before, try some before you buy a whole case. I find it very refreshing when it's chilled.
customer_reviews.author: Book Diva

customer_reviews.title: It helped me not drinking coke
customer_reviews.text: Great great great price. It helps me to stop drinking soda! After substitute coke with this for a while. Now coke is away toooo sweet for me. I love how it helps me to be healthier. Also, it brings your dinner to another level especially when you have guests coming! Just add some lime if you have it. Woohoo! Now you are in a 5 stars hotel restaurant! ;)
customer_reviews.author: AmandaZ

customer_reviews.title: Great price for such an expensive item
customer_reviews.text: This item is almost double the price in Wal Mart where I live. This is the best price I have ever seen and it came in fresh. It was not flat at all. Its better than other sparkling waters because it is much more palateable and easier to drink with food.
customer_reviews.author: Vespasion

customer_reviews.title: Favorite, has slight carbonation
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite carbonated water. The carbonation is very slight with a slight mineral taste. If you light lots of carbonation, this is not the drink for you. Hard to describe the taste but it’s just not as pronounce as Perrier and of course nothing like the flavored water. It’s not cheap, but the price isn’t bad for a pack of 24
customer_reviews.author: Mikeindc

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is the packaging. In this day of trying to be aware of waste, why package one perfectly fine box into another? Can’t you just put an Amazon label on the Pelegrino box? Other than THAT, I love this product! It’s delicious and forced me drink WATER which I never did before!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine M.

customer_reviews.title: REALLY sparkles!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Has a really refreshing , snappy bite to it! Definitely a step above the sparkling-water that one normally gets from the grocery store shelf. I think the fact that it's made with actual mineral water makes the big difference. I like to make glasses of lemonade with it but it's really great just swigging it out of the bottle!
customer_reviews.author: quanmech

customer_reviews.title: The Pellegrino bottles are PLASTIC NOT THE GLASS BOTTLES
customer_reviews.text: I have been enjoying Pellegrino sparkling mineral water since the 1970’s. I generally drink 3 large size glass (not plastic) bottles per day every day 365 days! Hassle free delivery was such a pleasure and I would continue buying if the cases were the lass bottles as the plastic bottles are unhealthy unless BHA FREE which isn’t stated??
customer_reviews.author: PHAEDRA L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount of bubbles
customer_reviews.text: IT's true what they say, Pellegrino does have the correct amount of carbonation. It is not so much that it stings your nose, but it is not so little that it tastes flat. The taste is pretty good thanks to the minerals in the water. Pellegrino is my first choice for sparkling water when I go out to eat.
customer_reviews.author: TheCleanGoodLife.com

customer_reviews.title: Product is fine drivers however ....
customer_reviews.text: Need to STOP PLACING BOXES IN FRONT OF THE DOOR SO IT CANNOT BE OPENED. THIS HAS BEEN HAPPENING SINCE IVE BEEN USING AMAZON, THEY PLACE THE BOX IN FRONT OF THE DOOR WHICH MAKES IT IMPOSSIBLE TO OPEN WITHOUT HITTING THE BOX. USE YOUR SMARTS DRIVERS & STOP PUTTING BOXES SO THEY BLOCK THE DOORS.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: The San Pellegrino taste
customer_reviews.text: This is one of our favorite sparking waters, which we have with all meals. I do wish the glass bottles were delivered, but alas, it does not appear to be possible at this time.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: My friend got me on Sparkling mineral water with a wedge of lime and a squirt from the wedge. It’s now my go to drink, very refreshing. I like the Plastic bottles as they are easy to travel with and are recyclable. Would purchase again. I think the price is better than if you got a bigger bottle in the store at 2.99-3.99 a bottle
customer_reviews.author: Khins4

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE OF POISONOUS BOTTLED WATER
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering this product for months. This particular batch was dangerous. Something caustic was inside of this sealed bottle was poisonous. BUYER BEWARE...
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: not a fan of sparkling water
customer_reviews.text: i wish i had known .. i know i should read better ... don't think i had on my glasses ... what a pain ...my hubby has worked up a drink recipe ... with lemon juice, sugar ...and it is like lemonade ...just to get us through it ... 12 bottles. will not buy again ever ... but if you are a fan of SPARKLING WATER ...u will love it i bet?
customer_reviews.author: ElizrdbthSpeaks

customer_reviews.title: The water box was sent upside down.
customer_reviews.text: I am sure the water is good, but most bottles had leak because the box was placed upside down in the packing box. One bottle was completely empty and all the rest had some leakage. I tested a few of these and the water was still effervescent, so I believe it is drinkable. I will not be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: ECornia

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing and not bitter at all
customer_reviews.text: I love S. Pellegrino, just the right amount of bubbles and crispiness, flavor wise is not bitter like most sparkling waters. Price is excellent as well and to get it delivered it at my door step is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Tomato45

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging
customer_reviews.text: Arrived intact due to excellent packaging, not fizzy/explosive when we opened despite shipping, the kids love it when i add flavored organic stevia to an entire bottle (chocolate, cola, cream, orange, lemon or root beer to name a few).... mom gets kudos for healthy soda ...
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Got this on scheduled deliveries as an alternative to my first love, Coke. Very good carbonation. Was hesitant due to the plastic containers but my county stopped recycling glass but still recycles plastic, so at least they’re recyclable and helps me stay hydrated
customer_reviews.author: ADL

customer_reviews.title: Basically Flat
customer_reviews.text: I drink this product all the time but in glass bottles. This taste pretty awful almost like a weak alka seltzer fizzes for a while but not as effervescent as the glass bottles. I really disked these plastic bottles. If you like partially flat sparkling water then this will be a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: lavender

customer_reviews.title: I can't get enough of these
customer_reviews.text: I come home from the gym thirsty for something with flavor but I don't want to drink soda because of the calories. S Pellegrino really helps because I can chug a whole bottle and not worry about the calories. I has a very good flavor and the fizziness isn't so strong that you can't chug a bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy Torres

customer_reviews.title: Packaging Diaster
customer_reviews.text: I love this water and buy it all the time. Today’s shipment, however, came all banged up. Packaging was a total disaster. Looked like it had survived a war. I hope I can disinfect it before opening it. Addendum: Finally opened the disgusting box. Bottles were undamaged, but there were only 11 of them, not 12!
customer_reviews.author: Rona Ostrow

customer_reviews.title: Big bottles! Very convenient. I can fill two glasses with one bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived safely in a large box surrounded with paper wrap in another box; all bottles sealed. Of course, delicious! Cheers! Will definitely purchase again! Btw, Enjoy chilled. I put a bottle in the freezer (long enough to get the plastic bottle cold)--The bubbles are smaller (compared to drinking the Pellegrino at room temp)and the taste is crisp and refreshing. Wayyy better than drinking it drinking it at room temp. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Sparklingly Delish
customer_reviews.text: When you can’t travel to Europe and buy sparkling water that is more expensive than wine, you may instead choose to buy it from Amazon and leave sparkling reviews. Buying this in 2020 is the closest that I will come to believing I’m in Europe for just a moment.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan G

customer_reviews.title: odor
customer_reviews.text: Had a terrible gasoline odor. First I thought its a packing box, but then each bottle had a strong odor and weird taste. Very unusual because consuming this brand for years just was getting at the grocery stores.
customer_reviews.author: imran sajan

customer_reviews.title: Better than the French stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've always preferred this to that French sparkling water. The taste is crisper, cleaner and goes better with lunch or dinner. Moreover it is more sensibly-packaged in a box versus the mess I got with the French alternative's shrink-wrapping.
customer_reviews.author: Prometheus

customer_reviews.title: I love the Brand, But
customer_reviews.text: I must say that I love the product, wee buy a 12 bottle case a month, but it has not been the first time that Packaging comes broken, outside and inside, last delivery It came with almost 7 bottles dirty and inside box broken
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought and how about glass?
customer_reviews.text: In a world full of artificial sweeteners and energy drinks, San Pellegrino is so fresh and a guilt free drink to enjoy. I would give this item a five star review but I would contend that it is a bit overpriced. At the Grocery, I can get a one liter bottle for 1.99 so I would hope Amazon will come out with a larger size. In addition, because of the dangers associated with plastic, I would love if they offered a glass option. That being said, my Pellegrino arrived safely and right at my door and the bottles were convenient to pack on the go and fit in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: NicDavidHart

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand but don’t like the way it was delivered
customer_reviews.text: I would rate it 5 star if not an issue: whole amazon box was totally wet. And since I’m reviewing my orders not exactly at my door, I needed to carry this wet thing to my car and drive it. Trust me, you don’t want such an experience.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: No “sparkle”
customer_reviews.text: This can be an expensive product, thought I was getting a good deal.....no fizz, just like regular bottled water, with no “sparkling”. Opened 2 bottles so far and I’m beginning to wonder if the rest will be like this? Going back to Costco.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Thaut

customer_reviews.title: Saving $20
customer_reviews.text: It is a good deal, since in closest Walgreen's I recently paid over $2 or $3 for bottle. Saved that way around $20. 12 bottles would cost me around 40 dollars with taxes and bottle deposits. Delivery by UPS was just 1 day delayed but for our reality in NY today it's Ok. UPDATE after reading other reviews: water itself is absolutely fine, NOT flat.
customer_reviews.author: Davida Hews

customer_reviews.title: It’s not fresh
customer_reviews.text: The box was busted up and the product was flat. I have never been able to guzzle Pellegrino water or any seltzer type water. You can tell this product has been sitting around for a very long time before being sold.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sparkling water
customer_reviews.text: This has a clean taste to it with just the right amount of carbonation for me. I often use it to add a bit “zing” to a glass of lemonade or juice. I am very pleased with it even though it is a bit on the expensive side.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A

customer_reviews.title: Half the normal carbonation tested 3 bottles out of the case...??
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time-check Exactly as described-check BUT the carbonation is half of what it normally is! I regularly drink Pellegrino so I have a clear understanding of what to expect. Is plastic different? Would transporting and constant shaking or moving affect this? I have never experienced this. I dont want to return a box of water minus 3 bottles....? What or who should I contact?
customer_reviews.author: K. Lakes

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I keep a stack of these loaded in my fridge at all times. It's a great alternative when you are tired of plain old water. No added ingredients, no sugar but still tastes sweet and carbonated. Definitely buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jess4456

customer_reviews.title: Just tastes...pure
customer_reviews.text: My mom tried this on a cruise and fell in love with it, so I ordered her a case. She says it's the best bubbly water and loves it. Great to have this shipped direct to home - not in love w/the plastic bottles, but the price is great (for when I purchased it, might have gone up by now!).
customer_reviews.author: JBug

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WATER, BEEN DRINKING IT FOR YEARS, YES, I AM ITALIAN. EVEN DRINK IT WHEN I VISIT ITALY
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for the excellent service and fast shipping. I love the water and drink a lot of it. You ship it safe and I have never had any problems or a flat bottle water. I will be a customer for life with Amazon. Many thanks. Al B
customer_reviews.author: MR OLDSTUFF ANTIQUES

customer_reviews.title: Great product and good price disappointing since there was no sparkle in the water
customer_reviews.text: We didn't think this product would go flat like soda but evidently it does. This is just regular plain water with no sparkle. Maybe that was why it was cheaper than regular price. Too cumbersome to return as we took apart and put away before opening one of the bottles. Continued use shows that all of them are flat! Check your product before tossing the container.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonfan

customer_reviews.title: Best price!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I decided to purchase a case of these, I live on the 3rd floor apartment building and carrying these up stairs isn’t easy. All bottles were carbonated and none were flat. Very easy to unpack the box it comes in and the best price I’ve seen these per bottle. This will be a weekly purchase now.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie wells

customer_reviews.title: Great deal! I had missed drinking sparkling water at ...
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! I had missed drinking sparkling water at every meal like I did at home in Europe, and sparkling water in the US can be super expensive. This is a great price for a great brand and the bottles are the right size to slip into your bag.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia T.D.

customer_reviews.title: A terrific tasting sparkling water.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite sparkling water. Thirst-quenching and it’s tastes great. And zero calories. You’ll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: My new go to drink
customer_reviews.text: I used to drink way too much soda. I liked the carbonation more than anything. I switched to Pelligrino and love it. I drink it by itself sometimes but I also add sugar free flavored syrups to it!! So good!! Vanilla makes it taste like cream soda. It’s also good with just a little lime.
customer_reviews.author: Emily McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Gasoline smell and weird taste
customer_reviews.text: My bottles smell like gasoline and the water has a weird taste which gives me a slight headache when i drink it. Tried a few bottles and they are the same. Weird b/c i have been drinking this water for years and it is my absolute favorite. Earlier orders were fine but this one was bad.
customer_reviews.author: kiko

customer_reviews.title: Are these fake?
customer_reviews.text: Every single bottle in the case is flat and does NOT taste like Pellegrino. I've drank it for many years, have it every day and THIS is not Pellegrino!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Stephens

customer_reviews.title: great taste!
customer_reviews.text: A great tasting products as I have ordered many cased in the past. However,..the price has gone up $4.00 in less than a year. Am not sure what`s going on with sparkling water market but all brands seem to have risen by a large % this past year (2019).
customer_reviews.author: ronj

customer_reviews.title: Not the same flavor
customer_reviews.text: The flavor wasn’t the same, I don’t understand why. It tasted diluted, probably old not sure but it wasn’t the same as to when I go and buy directly from store. I didn’t even bother returning because of the whole covid-19 pandemic
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: The best non-alcoholic beverage
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect substitute for an after-dinner alcoholic drink. It's fresh. It cleanses your palate. It has a zing of taste. And it quenches a bit of thirst. We don't drink alcohol so this is the perfect beverage for us to grab for special occasions.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product... ridiculous processing
customer_reviews.text: Product is great but it continues to be packaged poorly. Packer continues to rip boxes. Boxing is needed for proper storage. This forces bottles to be individually removed for safe transportation. As is this is an accident waiting to happen. This is 4th shipment received in same manner
customer_reviews.author: Kevin U.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty melted plastic
customer_reviews.text: The (inner) plastic layer melted and bent - which worries me if it made my water unsafe to drink. It tastes different and do not have the same quality as the glass ones. I don't recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Glass bottles > Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Its good stuff, but the plastic bottles dont hold the flavor as well. Next time I'm only buying the glass bottles. I was shocked at how different it tastes from plastic. Almost thought it was in my head but there's definitely a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Mayne

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: I’m not happy with the quality of this water. I don’t like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mineral water
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty with a lot of fizz. I use 2/3rd"s of this to 1/3 water for my lemonade because it is a little too feisty. Raised from $6.00 plus to $9.00 plus so I will probably buy it from the grocery store. But the shipping convenience was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Llda Schellhase

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: In the heat of the summer, I chug this stuff. The mineral water somehow does what gaterade is supposed to do without suger etc. Good for your guts. Less salty tasting than Perrier. Superior.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Bee

customer_reviews.title: PACKAGED EXTREMELY WELL THIS TIME
customer_reviews.text: I have been receiving this water for quite awhile and this is the very first time the packaging fits the bulk and weight. Thank you for a job well done. The UPS man at one time complained to Amazon about the poor packaging. Now for the next thing. UPS delivered my water to my apt door (I live on the 8th floor) the USPS will not take the elevator to deliver my water to me. Snow, sleet and rain and all bad weather but not the elevator. The boxes are heavy and I am 70 years old and loved having it delivered to my door.
customer_reviews.author: jetmmm

customer_reviews.title: Pellegrino
customer_reviews.text: I love this sparkling water. It is refreshing and soothing. Pellegrino is of course my choice and my favorite of all the sparkling waters. Just the right amount of bubbles!
customer_reviews.author: Miss muffy 4x

customer_reviews.title: Taste Italy Anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Brings back fond memories of Europe. Soothes an upset stomach. Compliments any meal. Yummy to drink room temperature or chilled.
customer_reviews.author: Mervster

customer_reviews.title: The Best Mineral Water
customer_reviews.text: Order two cases. Both were packed in separate outer boxes to protect the product. Boxes open easily. I really like that the bottles are plastic rather than glass. This was my second order. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Agent Terry

customer_reviews.title: Classic great sparkling water
customer_reviews.text: I love San Pellegrino sparkling water, these are great sizes, perfect for travel or lounging around the house, and they fit in the fridge easier. They were on sale, so I had to get them for such a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Some items never arriving or arriving damaged
customer_reviews.text: 2 of our boxes of water are missing and the ones that did arrive 4 of the box had the plastic inner liner spectated from the rest of the bottle. Not sure if it’s safe to drink.
customer_reviews.author: goatface

customer_reviews.title: S.Pellegrino
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this is the most refreshing and best tasting mineral water. I am glad to find this on line at a very good price during the COVID pandemic. My local stores haven't had it in stock for weeks.
customer_reviews.author: wabi sabi

customer_reviews.title: Tastes flat
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I haven't had pellegrino in a while and I've forgotten what it's supposed to taste like, but what I received tasted sort of flat. It was probably the result of shipping, but I was disappointed. It's not bad per se, but I don't think I'll be ordering carbonated drinks online again
customer_reviews.author: guy michaely

customer_reviews.title: Good price & nice to stock up on!
customer_reviews.text: I love sparkling water for when I get bored of flat water, have nice guests over, also for when I ever have a stomach ache. These are just good to stock up on. They last forever and getting the large pack really comes in handy for when they’re needed. I can now ask my guests, if they’d prefer sparkling or flat water. So fancy (:
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra R.

customer_reviews.title: Someone be drinking my water!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got a open 24pk with a pre-drunk/open bottle. 1/4 one of bottle missing in a unwrapped Manufacturing . I know it gets hot edit warehouse,but I still find this unacceptable! Yet,great water at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Monkeyhandler

customer_reviews.title: Great substitute for diet sodas. Don't miss them. Same price!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best sparkling water. Smooth going down. Satisfying going down. No aftertaste. No sugar addiction. A great product for a fair price. About the same price as big box but delivered. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MARIO V

customer_reviews.title: Be Aware, Pricing Varies
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but downgraded due to the fluctuating pricing....one week it is $15, another week is $13, and now this week (May 27th), it is nearly $19. Great value at $13, not so much at $19.
customer_reviews.author: uoficpa

customer_reviews.title: Very refreshing non-soda drink.
customer_reviews.text: Really great bubbly drink when you want a break from sugary soda or just any time you are thirsty. We have this on a subscription with Amazon so about every month we get a case of San Pellegrino delivered to our front door.
customer_reviews.author: Jack in TX

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: Have been drinking this water for years and years. This is now the second case where half of the bottles are semi-flat, some have a bad soap-like smell, a sickly taste, and the rest have absolutely no carbonation whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Harlow

customer_reviews.title: Good taste but drink it fast
customer_reviews.text: I've been drinking these for about 4 months and I am overall satisfied. The only complaint I really have is that the carbonation does not last very long, so if you are enjoying the water over a period of more than 15 or so minutes it starts to taste pretty bad until it becomes intolerable. It'd be nice to have a smaller bottle size as an option.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Valenziano

product_meta.title: S.Pellegrino Sparkling Natural Mineral Water, 33.8 fl oz. (12 Pack)
product_meta.description: Size:33.81 Fl Oz (Pack of 12)| Style:WaterEmbrace the spirit of Italian living with S.Pellegrino Sparkling Natural Mineral Water. Since its foundation in 1899, the S.Pellegrino brand has been synonymous with effortless style and Italian culture. S.Pellegrino bottles only the finest mineral water that goes through a 30-year journey through the earth in the San Pellegrino Terme area at the foothills of the Italian Alps. This journey mineralizes the water through contact with underground rocks, naturally enriching S.Pellegrino with mineral salts, calcium, and magnesium. The addition of carbon dioxide enhances S. Pellegrino, providing its unmistakable taste and sublte bubbles. Low in sodium and zero calories, S.Pellegrino has no artificial colors, flavors, or sweeteners. The 1 liter plastic bottle size is BPA Free and are the perfect for lunch with coworkers or a quick bite on the go, and the convenient 12 pack ensures you’ll always have S. Pellegrino on hand. Whether you’re meeting friends out for a meal, exploring the town, or enjoying dinner at home S.Pellegrino is the perfect mineral water for all of life’s delicious moments. The clean taste and crisp carbonation of S.Pellegrino perfectly complements the flavors of all foods, including spicy appetizers, rich entrees and decadent desserts. S.Pellegrino's effervescence and subtle bubbles bring out the best in every dish, making it a favorite of some of the world's best chefs, gourmets and foodies. S.Pellegrino embodies the essence of Italian life - the cheerful outlook and the joy of spending time together while food, laughter and conversation are shared. Simply open a bottle of S.Pellegrino Sparkling Natural Mineral Water to Enhance Your Moments
feature_bullets: Twelve 33.8 fluid ounce/1 L BPA free plastic bottles
Crisp and clean taste pairs well with any meal
Zero calories, low sodium, and no artificial colors or flavors
Naturally enriched with calcium, magnesium, and mineral salts

specifications.Domestic Shipping: This item can only be shipped to the 48 contiguous states and to APO/FPO/DPO addresses. For APO/FPO/DPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
